questions: What is the most challenging thing you have ever done in your life?
If you could live in any era, which one would you choose and why?
How do you know the answers to my questions?
Can you translate this sentence into Spanish?
If you could change one thing about the world, what would it be and why?
What is the most important lesson you have learned in life so far?
Can you recommend a good book to read?
How can I improve my memory?
Can you help me solve this math problem?
What are some effective ways to manage stress?
What is the most effective way to study for an exam?
Can you give me some tips for improving my writing?
What is the best way to start a business?
What is the meaning of life?
What is the best way to learn a new language?
lunar: 九月 星期四 辛丑年八月初十
daily: 人生是自己的，不要活在别人的眼神和口水里。不是所有的言论都需要别人理解，不是所有的选择都需要别人支持
任何时候，都不要瞧不起别人。鸟活着时，吃蚂蚁；鸟死后，蚂蚁吃鸟。一棵树可以制成一百万根火柴，烧光一百万棵树只需一根火柴。所以不要瞧不起任何人！你瞧不起别人时，只不过别人不和你计较
用人情做出来的朋友只是暂时的，用人格吸引来的朋友才是长久的。要知道，丰富自己比取悦他人更有力量
有些事就是不值得被原谅，跟大不大度没有关系，各有各的底线，做错了就应该考虑为自己的错误付出代价
信任就是一把刀，你把它给了别人，他就有了两个选择，捅你或者爱你保护你
有人说，这世间有两种浪漫，一种是相濡以沫，另一种是相忘于江湖
最好的爱人一定能在时光里相守，在困苦中相牵，在老去中相望
sentence:
l tried to convince myself something good would happen.
我说服自己会有好事发生。

Everyone has a story, just a different interpretation of the way.
每个人都有自己故事，只是演绎的方式不同。

Time will bring a surprise, if you believe
时间会带来惊喜，如果你相信的话。

Forget others' faults by remembering your own.
想想自己的错，忘却别人的过。

It is not easy to meet each other in such a big world.
世界这么大，能遇见，不容易。

You may see me, but I'm hollow.
你可以看到我，但只是我的躯壳。

Perhaps you get worse today, but tomorrow will always be new.
或许今天你过得很糟糕，但是明天总会是崭新的！

You’ve got to put the past behind you before you can move on.
在重新开始之前，还是先把过去放下吧。

Remind yourself that it’s okay not to be perfect.
提醒自己，有缺点没什么大不了的。

Nothing is to be got without pains but poverty.
世上唯有贫穷可以不劳而获。

You must always do what is difficult.
你要一直迎难而上。

Other presents come when you least expect them.
惊喜总是不期而至。

You can't give up on it. Never surrender.
绝不言弃，永不屈服。

One day someone will walk into your life, then you realize love was always worth waiting for.
有一天那个人走进了你的生命，你就会明白，真爱总是值得等待的。

Nothing is impossible to a willing heart.
心之所愿，无所不成

Keep your face always toward the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
永远面朝阳光吧，阴影就会被甩到后面。

There's no better way to overpower a trickle of doubt than with a flood of naked truth.
如洪水般的事实是打破丝丝疑虑的最好方式。
